DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether online multi session alcohol intervention improve treatment effect compare single session screen feedback . All participant trial receive single session screen procedure include individualized normative feedback ( usual care ) . Additionally , half participant receive simple online booklet effect alcohol . The half receive online multi session follow program .
DOC.detailed_description: Aims : Test whether multi session alcohol intervention improve treatment effect ( i.e. , reduce consumption alcohol ) compare single session screen feedback . Design : Randomized control trial ( RCT ) . Subjects condition receive single session screen procedure include individualized normative feedback . The control group receive online booklet effect alcohol . The treatment group receive multi session follow program `` Balance '' . Setting : Online study Norway . Participants : At-risk drinker recruit internet advertisement randomly assign one two condition .
DOC.criteria: hazardous harmful drinking ( i.e. , FASTscore 3 ) underage ( < 18 ) provide valid email address provide valid ( Norwegian ) mobile phone number
